project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A web-based platform to streamline the customer onboarding experience, provide self-service resources, and improve customer success management efficiency.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in to the COSP using their main SaaS product credentials.
dependencies: Integration with identity provider (e.g., Auth0, Azure AD)
technical_requirements: Implement SSO using industry-standard protocols (e.g., SAML, OpenID Connect)
Ensure secure storage and handling of user credentials
acceptance_criteria: Customers can log in to the COSP using their existing SaaS product credentials
Seamless integration with the identity provider, no additional login steps required

feature_breakdown.description: Display a customized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription tier.
dependencies: Integration with customer data from CRM (Salesforce)
technical_requirements: Fetch customer subscription data from CRM
Implement a flexible, rule-based system to generate personalized checklists
Allow admins to configure and update onboarding workflows
acceptance_criteria: Customers see an onboarding checklist tailored to their subscription tier
Admins can easily manage and update the onboarding workflows

feature_breakdown.description: Seamlessly integrate the existing knowledge base content into the COSP.
technical_requirements: Implement API integration to fetch and display knowledge base articles
Provide a search functionality to allow customers to find relevant content
acceptance_criteria: Customers can search and view knowledge base content directly within the COSP
Content is up-to-date and reflects the latest changes in the knowledge base

feature_breakdown.description: Display personalized dashboards showing the customer's utilization of the main SaaS product.
dependencies: Integration with product usage data APIs
technical_requirements: Fetch and process customer usage data from the SaaS product
Implement interactive dashboards to visualize key metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage)
Ensure data is refreshed in near real-time
acceptance_criteria: Customers can view personalized dashboards showing their product usage and adoption metrics
Dashboards are intuitive and provide actionable insights

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a visual tracker for onboarding completion and key feature adoption.
dependencies: Integration with customer data from CRM
Integration with product usage data APIs
technical_requirements: Fetch customer data and product usage metrics
Implement a progress tracking dashboard with visual indicators
Allow customers to view their onboarding status and feature adoption
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily track their onboarding progress and feature adoption
The progress tracker is visually engaging and provides a clear overview of their journey

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
technical_requirements: Implement a 'Contact CSM' button that triggers an email or ticket creation
Pre-populate the email/ticket with relevant customer information (e.g., name, subscription tier, key contacts)
acceptance_criteria: Customers can easily initiate a support request with their CSM from the COSP
The pre-populated email/ticket includes all necessary customer details

technical_architecture.data_flow: User requests -> Web Application -> Backend API -> Database/API Integrations -> Response to Web Application
security_considerations: Implement role-based access control (RBAC) for user permissions
Use industry-standard encryption (TLS 1.2+) for all data in transit
Ensure secure storage and handling of sensitive data (e.g., customer credentials)

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP within 6 months.
deliverables: Integration with identity provider, CRM, and knowledge base

implementation_phases.description: Enhance the COSP with additional features to improve customer success.
deliverables: Personalized dashboards for product usage and adoption metrics
Visual progress tracking for onboarding and feature adoption
Integration with email/ticketing system for customer support

risk_analysis.description: Complexity of integrating with multiple third-party systems (identity provider, CRM, knowledge base, etc.)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Carefully plan and test the integration workflows, allocate sufficient time and resources for integration development

risk_analysis.description: Potential performance issues with high user concurrency and data processing requirements
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement a scalable and optimized architecture, conduct load testing, and provision adequate infrastructure resources

risk_analysis.description: Challenges in creating a user-friendly and intuitive interface for the COSP
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Involve UX designers, conduct user testing, and iterate on the UI design based on feedback

risk_analysis.description: Potential budget overruns due to unforeseen technical complexities or scope creep
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement a robust change management process, closely monitor the budget, and prioritize features based on business value

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Track customer retention and cancellation rates

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce average TTV from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor the time between customer onboarding and first feature adoption

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Track the time spent by CSMs on onboarding-related activities

success_metrics.target_value: Increase the percentage of support questions resolved via the portal to 40%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitor the ratio of self-service to ticket-based support requests
